#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

ll pw(ll a, ll b,ll M){
  ll r;
  if(b==0) return 1;
  r = pw(a,b/2,M);
  r = (r*r)%M;
  if(b%2) r = (r*a)%M;
  return r;
}


#define M 1000000007
int main()
{

    ll t,n,ans;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        ans=pw(7,n,M);
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
